message.body: Basement
Coming
4got 2give u a $10 DSW coupon. Exp 6/30. Remind me

Howzit goin'? Got light bulbs, batteries, nails, screws? Taking what lamps? Got a vase? Will the baby grand fit in ur bedroom? Pls eat, take or discard Liza-only foods: smooth pb, jar of caramel topping in fridge, maté, cereals, etc. Did u get the bday candles & the clip, or are they folded into ur laundry? Grab office supplies from the secretary desk. Remember to say if supplies get low. We still have some of G Dubby's sewing goods, iron, small ironing board, etc. Look in downstairs fridge, grab some canned goods. Some carbs are in kitchen island nr napkins, as well as in pantry and in basement.
...and the partridge is in the pear tree we planted across the street...
Also have several uncommitted lampshades

Need bulbs (couldn't find 60w in basement). Need nails. Don't need screws. Have rechargeable batteries. Don't need vase. Ill fold the piano up into my closet when not in use. Got clips and candles. Would like ironing board. Not taking any family lamps. Will take food. Don't need lampshades. The partridge will get me in trouble - no pets allowed.
But it's partry trained
Oooohhhhh
U all set 4 the nite? I'll be home btwn 10:30 & 11:30 tomw. Pls email me w what u were able to do today & whatever's on ur agenda tomw's.
Or sumthin like that. I'm going to bed soon. V sleep-deprived.
I'd still like to hear about ur GI problems & anything else I can help with, clarify or put in context.
Do u want a wand scanner? We have 3 & have gifted 0.
Wonder if it can successfully scan a computer screen sideways in lieu of a print screen or snip.
That literally just creates an extra step. Sure ill take one
Pls save 10 mins to show me a coupla confusing Mac basics. I won't schlep mine if we can use urs.
I'll just take my flash w me
Ok

Fwd: Food in the house - bought a chicken and made burgers last night, both in the meat draw. We made peas last night, plenty left. Bags of lettuce in veggie draw. **MY REPLY TO DAD:** Thanks, Angel. Leaving now. For a change, i had to wait for somebody else who was late getting here.... Th<x3 fur the grub. Love u, too
Call me after appt. Love u!
Ok. Love you too! (I need to go straight home to let dog out, just a heads up)
